name: Blackjack (itch) (satp)
description:
A videogame that lets you play the famous card game of Blackjack against an AI

Bet how many coins you want, earn new ones and be smart!!!

Here a list of some of the major features that you will find:

  • The game as a save file sistem that creates a "cripted" text file in order to restrict the amount of coins that the user can give itself;
  • you will find a "settings" page that lets you customize the way you play the game and the AI of the dealer.

Some instructions:

  • In the menu use the arrow keys to move and use enter to select;
  • go to the "Instructions" page in the menu for more information on how to play the game;
  • the game is avaiable in two languages: italian and english.

DOWNLOAD NOW!!!

:)
